Divorced: I already had a broken heart and you've just broken it further. Please leave me alone.$s#$e#Please, @, don't do this.$3#$e#Just leave me alone!$5
Introduction: Ah, you must be the new farmer. Robin told me about you yesterday.#$b#Welcome to Pelican Town.$h#$e#I hope you like it here.#$b#There isn't much to dislike really. It's a very nice town.
danceRejection: That's sweet, but no thank you.$9#$e#I just don't like dancing much.#$b#Surely there's someone else you can ask?$2
Rainy_day_1: The rain makes the forest smell amazing. It reminds me of home.#$e#I'm from Gotoro originally. Where I was raised was usually raining.$1#$b#It was very soothing at night listening to the rainfall.$1
Rainy_Night_1: I should sleep well tonight, the rain is very soothing.#$e#I'm already feeling pretty tired from it.$1#$b#Maybe I'll turn in early tonight.
Saloon1: A cold drink soothes the nerves.#$e#If you drink, you can join me. I actually would like your company.$1
Saloon2: Oh hey, it's nice seeing you again.$h#$e#It's been a long day for me, but I'm in good spirits.$1
Saloon3: I keep seeing you - are you stalking me?$h#$e#Don't think I mind too much.$4
Saloon4: I think you're growing on me. Let me buy you a drink.$9#$e#Here, try this.[346]
Saloon8: Hello, love, it's a good night for a drink, isn't it?$h#$e#It's lovely to see you. I always enjoy talking to you when I get the chance.$4
Saloon: I come here damn near every day now.$h#$e#Gus is really good to me.#$b#Never had bad service from him.$1
LyellsHouse: You can stay but don't go snooping.#$e#Are you thirsty? I have cold beers in the fridge.$3#$e#I'll be letting my chickens inside pretty soon. This is the time they usually want to be around me.$1
Mon: Already you can hear the birds singing. It never gets old.$h#$e#Fall is actually my favorite season, but I love spring just as much.$1#$e#Gotoro had really great seasons. I miss it a lot.$2#$e#I'm not really used to talking this much.$2#$e#I'm sorry, I don't feel like talking much anymore.
Tue: I came here from Zuzu as well about three years ago. It's lovely here.#h#$e#Zuzu was a pretty bad place for me.$2#$e#I guess I've never really been one for the city life anyway.#$e#During my time at war, most of the places we grouped in were large villages.#$b#Or we would travel the countryside to a new location.#$b#It was pretty nice in a way.$1#$e#%He seems lost in thought now.
Wed: If you look around the forest and even in town, you can find a lot of good food growing in nature. Just don't overpick the poor plants.$h#$e#Nature is one of the most important things in this world.$1#$b#It deserves respect.$2#$e#I think that's why I love my small home so much - it's surrounded by nature.$1#$e#You've got a pretty big place yourself. I don't think I would like all that open space.#$e#Well, I really need to get going.#$b#$3#$b#%He looks annoyed. Better leave him alone.
Thu: I don't know why you speak to me so often, but I suppose I don't hate it.$u#$e#It's just so odd. I don't really look like the friendliest person.#$e#oh, it's not that I don't like talking to you.#$b#...#$b#I just get worn out pretty easily after a while.$2#$e#I should get going though, I have a few things to do today.
Fri: Sometimes I hate just being looked at.#$b#I can just feel people staring at my arm... Or, well, lack of one.$a#$e#Please don't look at it.$2#$e#I rather not talk right now, I'm in one of my moods.$3#$e#%He sighs and shakes his head. Maybe you should leave him alone.
Sat: I prefer being alone... But I won't turn anyone away if they want to talk.$h#$e#But sometimes it gets really tiring.#$b#I just want some peace and quiet.#$e#I like talking to you though, @. You're not so tiring.$1
Sun: It's always a good idea to water your crops before leaving the farm.#$e#You wouldn't want them to wilt, and that can happen seemingly overnight.#$e#Tell me how your harvest goes this month, okay?$1
spring_23: I don't know if I'll go to the festival tomorrow. That day is always hard for me.$s#$e#I just... Marlin died the day before the festival.$2#$b#I've never been able to celebrate the same since.$2
spring_13: Don't forget about the Egg Festival tomorrow.#$e#I like the Egg Festival. Eggs are one of my favorite foods.#$e#Plus the kids are really precious when they play and find the eggs.$1
summer_Mon: Jas is a beautiful young girl. She reminds me of my little one... I quite miss her.$s#$e#Oh yes, I used to be married with a little girl.$1#$b#She was such a wonderful daughter. Eliza was the best thing to ever happen to me.$1#$b#But then my wife, she, well...#$e#%He looks pretty upset.
summer_Tue: I think I enjoy living here, though I think my father is rolling in his grave because of it... He didn't really like foreigners, but I guess that's what I am now.$h
summer_Wed: You'd think after so long I would get used to socializing with people. But... I still feel like an awkward teenager.$s#$e#I'm surprised you talk to me so often, @. Isn't there someone more interesting you like?#$e#I suppose you know yourself best.#$b#I'm just not used to talking so much.
summer_Thu: This summer heat is just what I needed.$h#$e#I think I'll grab a ice cream today. I could really use the cold treat.$1#$e#Maybe you can join me if you like...$4
summer_Fri: It's days like this I wish I was back at sea.#$b#There's something truly rewarding about sailing.#$e#Maybe one day I'll return to the waters and set sail for a while.$1#$e#It's pretty romantic, sailing. it's like living a love story.$4
summer_Sat: I might go swimming today. It's been a while.#$e#But I'm not sure - swimming means I'd have to take my shirt off and really I don't like doing that much.$2#$e#Maybe I can later tonight, when people are sleeping.#$b#It'll be better if no one sees me.$1
summer_Sun: Ice cream is always good this time of year.$h#$b#I think the stand is open now you should grab one.#$e#If you want of course.
summer_10: Bring your best produce for the festival tomorrow.$h#$e#I have no idea what to bring this year.$2#$e#Maybe I'll spice things up a bit.$1
summer_27: One of my favorite festivals is tomorrow.$h#$e#The jellyfish are beautiful.#$e#I can't wait to see them again, it's so romantic.$4
fall_1: It's already cooling down, I love it.$h
fall_Mon: I know I shouldn't be so negative.#$b#But that Pam woman really gets on my nerves.$a
fall_Tue: You've something on your face.#$b#%He wipes it off with his thumb.
fall_Wed: Jas asked me what happened to my arm today...#$b#What am I supposed to tell her?#$b#Telling a child it was blown off in the war wouldn't be appropriate.$bWould it?
fall_Thu: $s Hrm. #$b# When you've been around as long as I have...#$b#Days start to blur together into one long lifetime.#$e#It's tiring.$s
fall_Fri: It's touching you want to talk to me so often.#$b#I'm sorry I never have anything interesting to say to you.
fall_Sat: I think my favorite thing about fall is the changing foliage. It's beautiful.#$b#That and anything pumpkin spice.$h#$e#I guess the pumpkin spice thing is pretty silly, but I don't think I care.$1
fall_Sun: I couldn't ask for a better place to live.#$e#It's so peaceful, even more so this time of year.
fall_15: The fair is overwhelming but I always try to go.#$e#hope you'll be there.$4
fall_26: Tomorrow is Spirit's Eve...$h#$b#You ever wonder if monsters get offended by us dressing like them once a year? I think I would.$h
winter_Mon: Buh... Have you seen the way Pam talks to her daughter?...#$b#I suppose it's none of my concern.$a#$e#But it really gets to me. I would never treat my family so poorly.$2
winter_Tue: If you ever need help around your farm, come ask me.$h#$e#I can help you plant and care for animals. I usually have spare time for extra work.$1
winter_Wed: The snow is beautiful. It's the little things that matter most as you age.#$e#Better watch your back, I like throwing snowballs.$1
winter_Thu: Last night I heard a ruckus outside and when I went to check it out, I found a pesky critter terrorizing my girls.$a#$b#Guess I'll have to stay up tonight to take care of the problem.$s
winter_Fri: Lately I've been listening to a lot of 50's music. It really tak-$h#$b#...It really improves my mood.#$e#H%He seems lost in thought.
winter_Sat: If it gets too cold in my house, I just turn the oven on. Warms up just as well.$sMake sure you stay warm, @, frostbite can be fatal.#$b#%Lyell's gone non-verbal for a while. Come back later.
winter_Sun: It's so cold I think my toes have frostbite. *chuckles*$h#$e#I'm just kidding, of course, frostbite is no joking matter, really.$1#$b#I wouldn't want to lose any other limbs.$2
winter_16: You're always checking on me.#$b#I'm not used to the attention.#$e#I don't feel like talking much today.$3
winter_17: What is it...?$a#$b#It's nothing, I'm just in a bad mood.
winter_18: I don't feel like talking today.$u#4e#%He's ignoring you.
winter_19: I really just need to be alone right now.$a#$b#%He looks away and waits for you to leave.
winter_20: Sorry for the last few days. Sometimes I get in a mood and I just need to be left alone for a little while okay?$s
winter_14: Don't forget about the Night Market coming to town on the 15th-17th.#$e#I always find great stuff there and the shows are pretty great too.$h
winter_23: The holidays are so stressful sometimes, but it doesn't make the festivals any less fun.$h#$e#I'm excited for the festival this year. I like giving people things.$1
Sun4: The people here are nice but keeping things private is nearly impossible.$8
Tue4: I live out in the forest to keep people from prying. Rasmodius understands this.$s
Wed6: If it were up to me, Joja wouldn't be hanging around this town.$a#$e#They're such a terrible company. I felt souless working for them.$5
Wed2: I'm a bit wary of strangers. No offense.$u#$e#Don't take it personally though, give it time.
Thu4: Keep a eye out at night, there's always something lurking in the darkness.$u
Fri4: Friday came quickly. Guess I'm losing time.$s#$b#%He looks pretty sad now.
Sat4: I try to be kind to anyone who approaches... But some people in this town really try me.$a#$e#It's nothing, just...#$b#People asking stupid questions.#$b#I know they're curious about what happened to me, but it's pretty rude to ask.$2
camp_fire_1: That means a lot to me.$l
event_camp_fire_2: I see. That's good to know$8
mountain_talk_1: Great minds think alike, I suppose.$h
mountain_talk_3: I suppose both have their cons and pros.
past_talk_1: I'm really glad you understand that... Some people don't.$9
past_talk_2: I suppose it is, isn't it.$u
past_talk_3: That's alright. Not everyone gets it.$h
Beach_12_39: $6 He's distracted right now, come back later.
aging_1: I don't meet many who think like that.$h
aging_2: I suppose it is. Let's drop the conversation, then.$u
aging_3: That's very true, isn't it? Wise words.$h
summons_3: Oh, I see. I suppose I could take a break.$8
blessings_1: That's true, I am being quite vague, aren't I?$h
blessings_3: That's okay, it's probably better anyway.$h
drinking_1: I hope you're right. It would certainly make me feel better if you were.$s
drinking_2: I guess so. Didn't really think of it that way.$u
shrine_1: Oh, you did... I just - I don't know if I can tell you. If you'll believe me...$10
shrine_2: Oh gods, you were. I swear I can explain.$10
apology_1: That... That means a lot to me, @, thank you.$7
apology_2: I'm sorry you had to. It won't happen again.
kiss_1: I'm happy too, @. I love you so much.$l
kiss_2: Oh gods, I'm so sorry, @... I promise that won't happen again.$s
marlin_1: Thanks for that. I always get a bit nervous telling people my beliefs.$h
marlin_2: Yes, erm, I suppose it is.$u
answer_one: I suppose you're right. I guess I'm just being stubborn$2.
answer_two: I guess you're right. I'll try to listen more.$3
Mon2: I'm not interested in getting close.$s
Mon6: Sometimes I notice people staring... I'm certain they're staring at my 'lack' of an arm.$s
Mon10: I wouldn't go into the mines alone. It's dangerous.
Tue8: You just keep coming back. Thank you for that.$h
Tue10: Hello, love, it's always nice seeing you around.$h
Wed6: I don't have many friends and there's a reason for that.$s
Wed8: If you're not busy later, we should grab a beer together?$9
Wed10: I was just thinking of you... Oh, it's nothing bad.$s
Thu10: You look good today...#$b#Well, I mean, you look good everyday.*cringes*$s
Fri6: Oh hello, what's that look for?$3
Fri10: You've been on my mind a lot recently.$9
Sat4: My days seem to just drag by.#$b#Drives me crazy.$8
Sat6: *Lyell is staring at you*#$b#...Hm? Oh it's nothing, I was just distracted by something.$9
Sat8: *Lyell makes eye-contact with you, but he doesn't approach.*#$b#*Oh, he's running off now.*$9
Sun6: *Lyell pulls something out of your hair* #$b#Don't mind me...$8
Sun8: I'm sorry, I don't have much to say to you.$8
Sun10: On Sundays I add gems and candles to my shrine.#$b#I'm not big on worship, but I like letting the gods know I think of them.$h
summer_Mon10: *He babbles incoherently*#$b#....Ah, I mean, it's a beautiful day isn't it?$9
summer_Tue6: Hm? My accent? Oh, well, I'm not from this country.$h
summer_Wed10: You look hot...#$b#I mean, you're sweaty.*cringes*$9
summer_Thu6: On hot days like this, I like going to the beach and sunbathing.$h
summer_Sat8: *Lyell sees you and quickly walks away.*$9
summer_Sat10: Look I...#$b#I'm not very good with expressing myself.#$b#I hope that doesn't bother you.$s
fall_Mon8: Something keeps bothering my hens at night. I'm thinking of setting traps.
fall_Mon10: *Lyell looks tired.*#$b#Hm? Oh sorry, I didn't sleep well last night.$8
fall_Tue8: This is the date I was discharged from the military...#$b#Word of advice: stick to your farm.$s
fall_Tue10: *Lyell looks like he's in pain*#$b#...Sorry, I just - sometimes I can feel my arm hurting even though it's not there.$s
fall_Wed6: This cold weather makes me want to go swimming.#$b#Is that crazy?$h
fall_Wed10: It would be nice to spend some time together... If you want to.$4
fall_Thu2: Not to be rude, but I really don't feel like talking right now.
fall_Thu6: It confuses me how often you talk to me.$s
fall_Thu10: I never thought I'd get this close to someone again.$9
fall_Fri10: Something about fall takes me back.$h
winter_Mon8: Winter is such a great season. I love the snow.$h
winter_Tue10: I guess it's pretty cold. Your face is red.
winter_Wed6: I'm sorry I get so distant.#I'm not very good at keeping up with people.$s
winter_Wed10: *Lyell looks like he wants to say something.*$9
winter_Thu2: Isn't there a farm you need to tend to?$3
pool_date2: I knew you would understand. I love you @$15
event_beach1: I suppose you're right. I was just being dramatic, I guess.$16
event_beach3: Hey, that's a really good idea. I'd like that a lot.$14
event_farm1: @, please don't ask that. I don't... I can't talk about it.$17
event_farm2: Don't you think I know that, @?!$18
event_farm3: @... You really are always there for me.$17
Event_stargazing1: I knew you'd appreciate it as much as I do. There's something truly special about stars. Nothing quite like it.$1
Event_stargazing2: Oh, you think so... I don't know, I think it's special.$2
give_flowersB: I'm sorry, I don't have anything to give to you...$4
stardrop_gift: This is so much, thank you.$h
reject_two_heartB: I'm not interested in a relationship.$2
reject_four_heartA: It's better that we stay friends.$2
reject_four_heartB: I think you should seek someone else out.$2
engageA: That's just wrong - you're already engaged!$5
engageB: I should pound you black and blue! You're already taken!$5
marriedA: I'll pretend you didn't ask, for your fianc√©'s sake.$a
marriedB: Perhaps instead of getting married, you should have stayed casual. I'm not interested in being a homewrecker.$a
refusal_knownB: It wouldn't work out. There's someone better out there.$2
